choices: Boy
Girl
1.content:
Welcome to Milkroot! We are happy you have choosen us out of all the boarding schools in the world to attend. First of all, we must know your name.

(Insert your name here)

Now then, what is your gender? (For Uniform standards)
1.title: The Welcome Letter

choices: Break down and put the "uniform" on
Demand an answer from Mimoshi-sensei
Sneak around for answers
You then meet your room mate.
Go talk to Yumiko
11.content:
"Welcome, freshmen!" smiled a fat, yet pretty woman with long black hair and glasses. "My name is Mimoshi-sensei, and I am your class supervisor,"

You look around, seeing a bunch of boys and girls your age, dressed casually. Obviously uniforms haven't been handed out for this class yet. It was quite a trip to get here to this part of Japan, but this school looks pretty good.

"Now then, you will attend to several rules," said Mimoshi, as she waddled back and forth.
"1: You will wear your school uniform everyday. We will not tolerate anything else. 2: Curfew is at 9:00 PM sharp!"

You hear a bunch of groans from all the students.

"3: You will obey your instructors. You will do what they say and eat what they say," said Mimoshi.

Ok, that last part was kind of weird.

"4: If you require assistance, talk to one of your teachers for help,"

Well, that's obvious.

"5: You will not head for the upperclassmen part of the school until later in the year when you will be able to fit with them better," finished Mimoshi. "Now then, you will be handled your dorm settings. You'll find your uniforms there,"

You are given a tag and it says, "C-5," You look at a directory and find its location, before you head there.
**************************************************************************** ***********************
Once you arrive at Dorm C, you look for room 5.

"Oh, you're looking for your room?"

You blink and turn to see a cute Japanese girl with braided hair, wearing a sporty blue top and a skirt. She is about your age and slightly shorter.

"Wait...this is a co-ed dorm?!!!" you shout.

"I guess so," said the girl, "My name is Yumiko," You tell her your name, before you say what room you're looking for. "That's next to my room," she says, before the two of you find rooms five and six. You shrug, figuring even if this is a co-ed dorm, you both have seperate rooms. You step inside, but your eyes widened...your room looks like a nursery!

"What is this?!!!" shouted Yumiko, before you run out and take a peek. Hers is the same, except pink instead of blue. The rooms are fashioned like they're for babies...no rather, babies who would be your size, except a lot bigger! What's going on?!!!

You then see a box on the crib in your "room" and open it to find an extra stretchy diaper and a blue baby tee. Just what kind of school is Milkroot anyway?!!!
11.title: The Freshmen Orientation (Boy Version)

choices: Lunch!
A Nap!
Your first class!
111.content:
"Come on now!" shouted the fat dorm manager, as she clapped her hands. There's no way you can't overpower her if she gets angry, and so you change into the baby tee and diaper. You sigh as you walk out, your diaper making your walking a little awkard. "Nein, nein, nein!" shouted the dorm manager, as she took Yumiko's hair in her hands. She quickly tied them into pigtails.

"Do I really?" whined Yumiko.

"Ja, now here are dorm rules! Learn them!" shouted the dorm manager, as you were both handed pamphlets.

1: Never be late for meal time. You will have ten meals daily.

Ten meals daily?!!!

2: If you feel the call of nature, your diaper is there for usage. There will be no usage of the faculty toilets. If you can not change yourself in the situated changing rooms, a teacher will be there to help you.

3: You will have play time for two hours a day.

That's...ok, you guess.

"Now then!" shouted the dorm manager, "It's time for..."
111.title: The Rules of Milkroot

choices: You, Yumiko, and the students all start getting fat
You feel weird and your mind gets foggier
The supervisor provides the next dish on the menu
1111.content:
"Already?" you blink, as you and Yumiko are escorted to the cafeteria. You are sat down at very low tables like the kinds little kids would sit at.

"All freshmen students are given preset meals! You will eat what you are given and all of it!" shouted the cafeteria supervisor, "First up is your milk!"

It was then holes opened up in the tables and hoses with rubber nipples came out. You were all instructed to put your lips around them, and you do so.

"Now drink!"

Milk is pumped through the hoses, you and the other students drinking. The supervisor and her staff make sure all of you are drinking, and soon you're starting to feel like a big water balloon. You look to see Yumiko's belly is getting stuffed big and round.

It was then...
1111.title: Lunch!

choices: Gently helping you to your feet and directing you to your next class
Slowly rocking you back and forth as your carted off to your dorm for a nap
11112.content:
You can feel the milk flowing down your throat in what seems to be a never ending stream. You continuously swallow, and with each gulp you can feel yourself relaxing more and more. Soon, the world seems to fade away as you find yourself in an almost waking dream.

'Oh, mashed cookies, wonderful. What's this, mashed pizza? What a strange menu. Oh, more milk,' you note each new item on the menu as you sit there in your daze, endlessly swallowing.

Finally you realize that lunch is over and one of the staff members is . . .
11112.title: You feel weird and your mind gets foggier

choices: Your Diaper Was Full (Peepee or Poo Poo)
You Were Gently But Firmly Immobilized In A Blanket
111122.content: Slowly rocking you back & forth as you're carted off to your dorm for a nap. Then you notice something else...
111122.title: Rocking the Big Baby Boy

choices: You Peed Or Pooped
It Was Feeding Time Again.
1111222.content: That's when you noticed that there was a blanket wrapped around you, it was firm enough that a baby wouldn't get out without hurting themselves, but an older human being probably could. "Hey what's happening here!?" Or at least that's what you would have said if you weren't busy sucking on what could only be a pacifier. It was a bright room decorated with cutesy little animal pictures all around. One thing they all had in common, besides the cutesyness, was that they all wore diapers. You tried to struggle & a staff came through door with a baby mobile. He turned it on & the next thing you know you heard a soft but wonderful humming flow through your body increasing your sense of relaxation untill...
1111222.title: Blanky Boy Bedtime

choices: Feeding Codes of Conduct 101
PE - Crawling and Play Time
Diaper Use for Beginners
1113.content:
"Now move along to your first class!" she shouted as she hurried you two out of the dorm. You looked at the now pigtail wearing Yumiko and both of you looked each other up and down as you were both now wearing the "uniforms" you had found in your rooms.

Yumiko tried to cover herself up and said, "T-This is a weird first impression."

"There's a lot of stuff weird about today," you replied crossing your arms. "Maybe we can learn more at class."

The two of you split up and headed off to class. You arrived at a classroom and when you entered it looked just like your dorm room, with a strange nursery feel to it. There were toys all over the place and wallpapers with bright colors. You sat at your desk which oddly enough fit you unlike the other furniture you had seen so far and looked up to see another student at the desk in front of you. It was a rather emo looking boy with black greasy hair and makeup on, and he was sporting an all black version of the school's "uniform."

"Hey," you said trying to get his attention, "is this your first day at the school too?"

He looked back at you and you noticed he had a pacifier around his neck on a chain. "Nah, they made me come yesterday but I refused to put this stupid thing on. So they punished me and, well, let's just say I decided to put it on."

"Yikes," said a woman sitting next to you who was listening in. She had brown short hair that framed her face and large round coke bottle glasses. She was wearing a green version of the uniform and had numbers across her top. "I heard the punishments here were bad. That's why I put this on no questions asked. At first I thought it was a prank but I didn't want to risk it."

"Yeah, that's what I heard to," you said slouching down. "If this is what they make us wear, I'd hate to see what the classes are like... Hey wait, what class is this exactly?"
1113.title: Your first class!

choices: How to be fed
Tube-feeding
11131.content:
That's a weird class name, you think.

It was then a very large woman with big breasts, an enormous belly, and a big butt that could crush you if she was to sit down on you came waddling in. She had long red hair and wore a purple bandana around her head.

"Hello little dears! Welcome to Feeding Codes of Conduct 101! We're going to teach you the new proper way of eating!" smiled the woman, "My name is Ms. Keikei, and our first lesson is..."
11131.title: Feeding Codes of Conduct 101

choices: The Teacher begins feeding them
A Student Assistant comes in to assist in the feeding
111311.content:
"How to be fed?" you ask under your breath. "What does that mean?"

You weren't the only one confused, Ms. Keikei looked around the room and saw that only a handful of the students thought they knew what this meant. "Well I see a bunch of confused faces, but that's perfectly alright, we come to school to learn. Can I get a volunteer to help me?"

The studious glasses wearing girl next to you raised her hand quickly, fidgeting in her seat. "You actually want to participate in this stuff?" asked the black clad student in front of you.

"I don't know what's going on at this school," said the bob cut wearing girl, "all I know is that I want to get good grades, so if this helps me then fine I'll gladly do it."

"Great," said the teacher, "that's the kind of ambition we like to see here. Now can I get another students to help us out? How about you?" she asked pointing at you. Before you could respond the girl sitting next to you grabbed your hand and began walking you towards the front of the class.

As you stood up there both you and your fellow volunteer couldn't help but feel embarrassed, standing up there in your school "uniforms" even though everyone else in the class was wearing them except the teacher. "Thank you both for coming up, how about you introduce yourselves to the class?"

You nervously introduced yourself and quickly afterwards your fellow volunteer said, "I'm Debra Daines."

"Excellent class, now let's begin with a little example of right eating and wrong. First off, we have some food here in front of each of you," she said as she led the two students behind a table. She pointed down to reveal two slices of pie before them. "So to begin, show us how you're supposed to eat."

Both of you shrug and reach for silverware next to the plate and begin slicing up the pie to eat it. The teacher grabs the forks from your hands and takes them away. "Sorry, but that was wrong."

"What?" asked Debra looking heartbroken.

"First we do not stand while we eat, you need to sit down," she said as she rolled over two high chairs for you and Debra. She then pointed to them and you couldn't help but find it odd to have to sit in one.

Debra on the other hand hopped right in and said, "Of course, sorry teacher."

"And secondly, I know you kids will be eating a lot, so its fine to feed yourself, but if someone is around to feed you then let them do it instead. Here," she said as she tied bibs around both you and Debra, causing the two of you to blush uncontrollably, "now lets show you how to be fed."
111311.title: How to be fed

choices: Ask the teacher about the food
The teacher feeds Debra next
1113111.content:
"Ok, now when being fed, you must relax your mouth and open it wide," explained the teacher, before she takes a spoon full of some kind of mashed food and feeds it to you. "Never do it too wide and don't struggle,"

You swallow the contents, licking your lips to realize you were just fed some kind of mashed beef and cheese food. Maybe some kind of cheeseburger pizza?

What now?
1113111.title: The Proper Method

choices: Go to another class
Go back to the dorm or hang out with friends
11131112.content:
Debra opens her mouth and stops you from asking about the meal by asking "Me next please, I'll do it right." She opened her mouth wide as the teacher just chuckled.

"Hehe, alright alright," she said as she took another spoonful over to her, "Aren't you being such an eager student, I like that."

Debra got a big grin on her face, clearly excited to be praised for this. She took a bite from it, and her excited face turned to a look of shock. "Wow, that's... that's interesting."

"Oh you like it, well let's see if you two have gotten this down," said the teacher as she took another spoonful and started maneuvering it around like an airplane. Both you and Debra looked at each other in confusion and mild discomfort. Both of you just shrugged and opened wide. The teacher stuffed one spoonful after another into each of your mouths while the whole time narrating it for the class."Now when you eat you'll very likely get messy, but that's alright, there's always someone who can clean you up, and being messy can be fun so don't worry about it."

Eventually the food supply ran out and both you and Debra hopped very sluggishly out of your chairs. When you hopped out you felt your stomach bob up and down a bit, and you instantly noticed you were a tad pudgier. You looked over at Debra and noticed her cheeks were a bit rounder and her whole body was a good twenty to thirty pounds heavier. "Ooooh, I feel a bit bloated," said Debra, then realizing she said it and blushing a bit.

"Oh right," said the teacher with a grin. "All the food at this school is designed to give you the most nutrition it can, don't worry, you'll be big and healthy soon. After all you're growing girls and boys, you need to bulk up some."

The rest of the class looked rather unsure of what this meant, but there was no time as the class let out and the teacher gave you your homework to eat at least two more jars of this food. Where do you go now?
11131112.title: The teacher feeds Debra next

choices: gym
diaper mechanics
111311121.title: Go to another class

choices: Go and ask Mimoshi.
Yumiko arrived from her class.
111311122.content:
You finally staggered back to your dorm, still nursing your stomach. You ran your tongue along your palate, still tasting the strange concoction that the teacher fed you and Debra. Even after the lesson, you could still taste it, and it was a relatively long time you had taken to return to the dorm.

The taste held your attention throughout the trip, and as you sat down, you continued to ponder. It was relatively simple in its flavour, and yet it continued to hold your attention. What was it you thought it was? Cheeseburger pizza? Mashed?

The more you thought about the strange food, the more you wanted it. All the better to finish your homework. Suddenly, you paused, your eyes widening. Where were you going to find two more jars? Was there a Student Union Shop at this Academy? Should you ask Mimoshi-sensei?
111311122.title: Aftertaste

choices: Ok, you win
You’re nuts!
112.content:
“I want answers and I want them now!” you say to Mimoshi-sensei while barging into her office with Yumiko right behind you.

Mimoshi-sensei was signing some papers on her desk. “I take it you need some assistance.”

“Assistance my ass, what’s with the nursery doom rooms and baby tees and diapers?!”

Mimoshi-sensei stopped writing. “I’m sorry to have deceived you, but as you now suspect Milkroot is not an ordinary school. Our goal is to make certain young people big babies; to do this to things need to be done to you. First you must get fatter, a lot fatter; second we have to gradually regress your minds to the equivalent of an infant’s.”

“But why would you do something like that?” asked Yumiko.

“What we do is as much for your sakes as it is for our own interests. All I can say is that Big Babies are going to be much, much more common in the world and every student here will have a roll in that.”

“And you expect us to just go along with this?”

“It’s your choice.” Mimoshi-sensei said while taking out a weird looking gun. “You can either co-operate or you can both be disciplined.”
112.title: Mimoshi-sensei's office

choices: Rows of feeding tubes
Giant high chairs loaded with mashed food and giant bottles
Low tables built like tot lunch tables
1121.content:
You can't win here. You don't want to get shot and you don't want to know what kind of discpline they have in mind.

You sigh and give in, before leaving Mimoshi-sensei's office. You and Yumiko put on your "uniforms", and hear a bell. According to the schedule, it's breakfast #5.

You and Yumiko go to the cafeteria to find...
1121.title: Can't Win Here

choices: continue...
11211.content:
As they enterred the cafeteria, you notice it's not an ordinary cafeteria. The room is vast, the size of
an ordinary high school gym but with a few changes. Where a scoreboard would be, a giant television is
mounted, displaying various bits of new around the screen but it is mainly occupied by a giant message: BREAKFAST #5, followed by a list of bullet points, now empty. The entire far wall is occupied by the same, large, 20-foot-wide doors similar to your side, where numerous students are enterring. The side walls are coverred by gigantic picture windows, showing a landscape of rolling meadows and various silver buildings. Odd enough, there are security guards posted at each end of the room, seemingly guarding the doors. The main feature of the room occupied most of the floor space. About twenty huge rows of tables ran perpendicular to the windows. Instead of benches, there are giant spherical chairs, similar in diameter to the doorways, filling each side of the table. A glass tube was suspended from a network of tubes in the ceiling, each ending at each place, where a large plate rested.

"Wow..," you say in amazement. "This is truly-"

"Amazing...," Yumiko interrupted. " It didn't look this big from the outside."

"I don't know what to say," you state as you eye the tables. "We should get a place before they run out."

"HA! I doubt it!," Yumiko laughs. "Anyway, we still should."

The two of you walk down to the end of the room, to the least crowded of the rows. You choose a seat near the center and grab the chair. Suprisingly, it swivels around on its own in response to your touch. "OK...weird," you mutter. The chair is covered with plush blue pillows, and as you sit down, you immediately fall backwards into them. Trying to right yourself, you hear an OOF right beside you. It seems that Yumiko tried the same thing.

"Have you ever seen something this plush,?" she exclaims.

"Vaguely, but it seemed so long ago that I can't remember."

"Yeah, it's odd. that's the same for me, but I remember it being more from when I was young."

"You're right. It is weird," you reply, finally achieving a stable position, kneeling near the edge, half envelopped by
the pillows. Yumiko eventually lies down, her head just past the edge.

"Well..," she starts.

"Well...what?," you ask.

"What do we do now?"

"Oh, I don't know," you hint sarcastically. "I'm guessing, since we're in a crazy, futuristic cafeteria, in a bizarre school in the middle of nowhere, sitting in chairs fit for giants, we should wait and do what that lady Mimoshi said."

Yumiko laughs, a light, high chuckle that puts a smile on your face as well as hers.

"Good job, Sherlock! Now, if you can find a way to get us out of hear, that would be nice!"
11211.title: Rows of feeding tubes

choices: start eating.
look around at others first.
112111.content:
A few minutes later, as the last few students settle down, all the doors in the cafeteria slam shut. Both you and Yumiko look up curiously, wondering why that was necessary.

"Were they expecting us to leave or something?," you wonder.
"Well, I guess that option isn't available now, is it?," Yumiko retorts.

As some of the other "students share their same thoughts, the giant scoreboard suddenly blacks out, the breakfast message disappearing as well as the bullet points. Seconds later, the screen turns back on, now with a picture of a large, caucasian female sitting in an easy chair on it.

"Welcome new students to Milkroot Academy. I am your headmistress Jess Smith and you will probably see a lot of me in the weeks to come. First of all, for those who aren't familiar with the curriculum at our school, you students have been selected to usher in a new era of living. Our goal is to transform the lifestyles of each and every one of you into those that you experienced earlier in life, mainly early childhood. You will be changed physically and psychologically in this life-changing transformation. Our staff will satisfy every and all of your needs, as long as you follow every one of their instructions. Once your progress is far enough along, you will move up to the upperclassmen section of the school."

Suddenly, a commotion is heard a few rows down, The two of you swivel in your chairs to see what was the matter. A few students, in shcok and in sheer panic at the news, had jumped out of their chairs and were running down the aisle towards the nearest door. There were 3 in all: 2 boys wearing each a navy blue and green baby tee, and a dark-skinned girl with a purple sport tank top. The trio reached the end of the row and began their efforts at openning the door.
The escape did not last long, as 4 or 5 guards ran through a side door, apprehending the students.
As they travelled back through the door, the 2 boys tried to resist while the girl was being litterally dragged through, tears streaming down her cheeks. As soon as the excitement had begun, it had ended abruptly.

"Dear me," Mrs. Smith continued. "I see some of you have already attempted to break the rules. Let it be a warning to you all: break the rules and you will be subjected to a fitting punishment. Now, let's start with breakfast #5 and, after you are finished, you will directed to your next class. Have a nice day."
Mrs. Smith vanished, replaced once again by the normal scoreboard.

" What the hell happened?," you exclaim. "Those kids looked like they were being dragged off to torture, not punishment!"
"I guess that escape is definitely NOT an option now!," Yumiko answers, a hint of fear in her voice.

What the hell is this place?!?, you wonder.

An intercom crackles in the distance, interrupting your train of thought.

"NOW SERVING BREAKFAST #5: FIRST COURSE"

Automatically after the message, the first bullet point revealed itself to be home fries and bacon.

"Now we see what the tubes do."

A commotion on the ceiling revealed itself to be something moving through the tubes. Seconds later, blob travelled through the tubes and deposited themselves at Yumiko and your plates. A huge mound of home fries as big as your head took up half the space on the plate. The other half was covered by thick, juicy strips of bacon.

"Omigosh, do they expect us to eat all of this?," Yumiko asked.

the intercom buzzed again: EAT OR YOU SHALL RECEIVE PUNISHMENT.

"Does that answer your question?," you answer.

Still, you...
112111.title: continue...

choices: continue 1
continue 2
1121111.content:
You look at Yumiko, both of you sharing the same look of confusion and fear, but at the same time acceptance to your fate. So, turning back to your plate, you reach your right hand towards the heap of fries. You grab a handful, noticing Yumiko has followed suit. Breathing deeply, you take a bite out of the handful.

WHOOOOSH!! A wave of delight passes through your body. You have never tasted anything this divine before! beneath the crispy golden brown exterior, the inside of the fries are filled with a smooth mashed potato. You taste some butter mixed in with it, and the fries have just the right amount of salt. You devour the rest of the handful, in a frenzy. Only then you notice that your mouth has become extremely dry. Looking around the table, you notice no glass or bottle that you could quench your thrist with. Yumiko is going through the same problem next to you.
Suddenly, a hole opens in the table and a baby bottle shoots out onto the table. It has the same shape as a baby bottle, except it's is the same size as a 2-litre soda bottle. Not stopping to wonder this strange phenomenon, you grap the bottle with both hands and suckle feverishly from the cap. The sweet fluid that flowed into your mouth rivaled that of the meal in front of you. The milk tasted so filling, yet it eliminated all notion of hunger. As soon as the thirst disappears, you pry yourself from the bottle and continue to shovel both homefries and bacon into your mouth.

Over the next 30 minutes, you alternate between shoving food into your mouth, which now ranged from homefries and bacon, to scrambled eggs and buttered toast, to suckling milk from the giantbottle. During your frenzy, you do not notice Yumiko beside you, who has seemed to take pleasure in the gorging. She is now licking up stray pieces of food from the plate. Soon after, you stop eating, both food and milk in the bottle gone.

"Whatever did we have to worry about?," Yumiko says, licking food from her lips. "This is like a dream come true!"

You reply: "Why do you say that?"

"Well," she starts. "Ever since I was little, despite all the sports and studies occupying my life, my secret fantasy was to try and eat large quantities of food for the rest of my life."

"Really?," you wonder.

Yumiko: "You must think that I'm crazy."

"No, of course not!," you reply. "Actually...I find it kinda cute." You blush.

Yumiko: "...Thanks."

Staring around, most of the other students had finished as well, with only a few still eating. A few minutes later, Mrs. Smith appears again on the screen.

"I hope that you all enjoyed your first meal. As you may already know, you, as students, will receive ten meals a day. Your next meal will commence in an hour. In the meantime, head over to your dorm advisor to receive your schedules. Have a nice day."

Barely recovering from this meal, you swivel in the chair and crawl over the edge to get up. As your feet hit the ground, you notice something odd when you move. Looking down, you notice that the muscles in your legs now show less definition than before. They now have skin even covering all of your leg. You take a step forward and notice that the skin on your leg slightly jiggle, ripples travlling down you leg. In a mix of confusion and awe, you also notice that the neat, sixpack you had before now caused a bulge in your stomach, one inch out from your belly.

"What are you waiting for?," Yumiko asks. "Let's go!"

You agree and have a passing glance at her. You do a double take. Before, Yumiko had a slender body, just barely fitting into her diaper and sport top. Now, standing before you, her belly distended out from her waistline, an inch of fat sagging down from the bottom of her shirt. Her legs were more shapely, her thighs and calfs gaining a few inches each. The biggest changes were in her arms and chest. Her modest boobs from before had grown a size, from a small A the a B. Her arms also had gained some weight, baby fat now jiggling with every step. As she walked past you, leading the way, you couldn't help but notice her new hindquarters, a mass of fat swaying from each cheek. You follow her out the door, trying to not adhere your eyes to her butt.
1121111.title: Let it begin...

choices: Go meet some other students
Go ahead and get your schedule from your dorm adviser
11211111.content:
The two of you made your way back to your dorm, where you saw the seating room in the entrance to the dorm was fairly empty.

"Hmm, guess we got back early," you said to Yumiko.

"Yeah, I didn't think we were going very fast, but I am totally beat," said Yumiko as she walked over to a large pink chair and sat down, her new stomach fat scrunching up and her diapered butt sinking into the soft cushion.

"Me too," you said feeling a tad tuckered out yourself. You joined her by sitting in an equally large chair, this one merely colored blue. As you sat you felt your legs beginning to touch as the new fat around them rubbed against each other very slightly.

"We were supposed to go see our dorm adviser to get our schedule," you said with a hand on your very full stomach, "but we've got some time to kill. What do you want to do?"

"Hmm, well you know, I haven't yet met anyone else at this school other than you... not that you aren't great," she said getting nervous, "I just meant..."

"Yeah I know," you said laughing a little. "You're right, might not be a bad idea to meet our fellow neighbors in the dorm."
11211111.title: Back at the Dorm

choices: A short, young chubby boy with glasses on a computer, like a grade-skipper
Free Choice
112111111.content:
You and Yumiko then head out your dorm room and look around for the other dorm rooms. You see the one next to yours and knock on it.

"Yeah? I'm coming,"

The door opens to reveal a plump, frizzy-haired redheaded girl with glasses. Like Yumiko, she's in the girl's standard diaper and top, but is also wearing a blue sweater over her top.

"Oh hey. My name's Samantha. You can call me Sam for short," smiled the girl. You and Yumiko introduce yourselves. "Heh...quite a school we've gotten into. But I'm not that worried,"

"Huh? Why?" you ask.

"Well...this would be normally embarrassing...but since we're all in this situation, I can say this. I've had some problems in the past with my...inner plumbing...as you would say," said Sam, "So this really isn't a big change for me,"

"Ah...and who's that?" Yumiko asks, pointing to the person behind Sam. It was a...
112111111.title: Your Neighbors

choices: "Yeah, kind of wierd isn't it?"
"No, I'm just visiting like you two."
1121111111.content:
You see a young boy over on the computer like he didn’t even know you were there. He appeared to be a little bit young compared to the norm, but with his glasses covered eyes fixed to the screen you figure he skipped a grade or two. He was also sporting a big belly on his frame and is wearing a bigger sized diaper than you were.

You approach the kid wanting to greet him. “Hello what’s your name?”

“Kyle,” he said while still glued to the screen.

“And how is it you’re here?” you ask. “You look a little young to be here, aside from us all wearing diapers that is.”

Kyle then turned around to meet you face to face. “ Well, my mother has always believed that a good education is important in the world, so my life mainly revolved around books and computer related stuff. It definitely showed as I had advanced a couple of grades for my work. I never really took an interest in sports or physical activities so I am a bit fat. As for being as this academy I had received a scholarship for here. And before you ask, I really don’t care that I’m wearing diapers here. For me it just means toilet time gets transferred to study time.”

1141.content:
“Uh, excuse me…” You ask somewhat awkwardly, “Are you a guy or…?”

Saku chuckles a bit, “Is it that hard to tell?” He says, fortunately not sounding too offended. He opens the crib and sits down on the bed, before lying back. “I am a boy. Sorry for not telling you before. Do you want me to show you?” He looks back at you, a teasing expression on his face. You didn’t notice it before, but looking closer, he does have some, scarce amounts of facial hair.

“N-No, no, it’s fine! I believe you. I was just, uh, checking…” You stammer out nervously. Saku smirks. “They wouldn’t let guys and girls share dorm rooms, y’know?” You scratch the back of your head. Why didn’t you think of that before?

You step into the room, closing the door behind you. “A-Anyway… So, what are you doing here? Uh, at the school I mean…” You ask, attempting to break the ice. “Well, I heard that they had a good sumo wrestling program here.” He says, glancing up at the mobile hanging on the ceiling above his crib.

“Sumo?” You reply, probably sounding more surprised than you should’ve. You always thought of sumo wrestling as fat guys in diapers slapping each other. You never understood the appeal, and besides that, he looks way too thin to be a sumo wrestler. You almost mistook him for a girl at first.

“Yeah. As you can probably tell I’m pretty scrawny right now. I’m hoping that they can help with that.” He says as he gets off the bed. “My dad and older brother are both sumo wrestlers. I’m hoping to try and follow in their footsteps; I just need to start gaining weight first. It sucks having a high metabolism sometimes.” He laughs. “Do you want to join the sumo club with me? We could spar.”

“I…I’ll have to think about that…” You say, not really wanting to turn down his request, but not really thinking you’d be too interested. “I’ll have to get adjusted first, especially with… this?” You motion toward your babyified dorm room. “Is this… normal?” Saku shrugs, “I don’t know. Personally, I think it’s pretty cute.” He laughs. You smile a bit. He actually seems surprisingly nice. Even though you’re pretty confused, Saku at least seems to be taking it well.

“I’m not too sure about the uniforms though…” You mutter as you continue looking at them.

Just then…

114131.title: A burly, older man waiting outside.

1141311.content:
“He’s the school’s Sumo Coach.” Saku says. “S-Sumo Coach…?” Saku nods, “Yeah! Well, general P.E. coach actually, but he teaches manages the school’s Sumo program. I told you I had signed up for classes.” Saku explains.

Before you can ask any further question, Saku has already opened the door, allowing the massive man to enter. You hadn’t realized just how big he was from the peephole. This guy is HUGE! He dwarfs both you and Saku easily. His big belly, barely restrained by a tight tanktop, sways as he lumbers into the room. You can see a carpet of chest hair protruding from the top of the man’s shirt, which is complemented by the bushy beard on his fat face. He’s also wearing a pair of track pants and a small jacket emblazoned with the school’s logo.

The man looks at both of you, a gleam in his eyes. He’s Japanese, like Saku, but fatter a much more… manlier. He smiles at both of you warmly, “Welcome to Milkroot! My name’s Otonari-sensei, but please, feel free to call me Otosan.” He grins widely and opens his arms, to your confusion.

You bow slightly to him to be polite, but Saku instead walks over, and to your surprise, hugs him! Saku buries his face in Otosan’s big belly as he wraps his arm around him. Otosan turns his attention to you, “Well? What are you waiting for, son? Bring in it!”

Uncertainly, you approach the fat man, and are suddenly pulled into a big bear hug with his other arm, smothering you against his stomach. You can’t really resist since he’s your teacher, but can’t say it’s very enjoyable. As you’re pressed against his belly, you note that he smells strongly of talcum powder for some reason.

He rocks the both of you back and forth in his arms, before letting go, to your relief. “Sorry, I just wanted to great my new students personally.” He smiles, firm hands still placed on your’s and Saku’s shoulders. “I’ll be your Gym Teacher and dorm supervisor during your stay at Milkroot, so please feel free to talk to me at any time. I’m also the manager of the school’s Sumo team.” He says boastfully.

“Now that introductions are out of the way, Saku, you’ll be joining us in the Sumo Club, correct?” He asks, directing his attention toward Saku, who nods excitedly. He then turns towards you, “And what about you, son? You wanna join too?”

Before you can politely decline, Saku answers for you, “He’s thinking about it. I think he’ll be convinced when he sees us practice tomorrow!” He smiles optimistically. Otosan beams, “Excellent! I look forward to seeing you boys there!” He gives a hearty chuckle, and before you can do anything, pulls you both into another big hug.

Even though you want to get away, you can’t help but admit that there’s something strangely comforting about the man. He seems pretty fatherly. A part of you is worried about disappointing him by telling him you don’t want to join the Sumo Club.

After a few minutes of holding you against his fat gut, he finally lets go. “I’m happy to see such cute boys like you two on the team. I’m looking forward to seeing you there next meeting. And, like I said, feel free to come to me if either of you have any questions.” Saku nods while you just give him a shy smile. Then, as if your meeting with your new teacher couldn’t get any weirder, he suddenly leans down and plants a big kiss on your forehead.

He laughs as he sees you get flustered. “Sorry for surprising ya kiddo, I just thought you were too cute not to give a big ol’ smooch!” He chuckles as he ruffles your hair. Saku tugs on his shirt, “Can I get one too?” He asks. Otosan grins, “Of course!” and gives him another kiss on his forehead. “I have to go and greet the other students now. You boys be good! I’ll see you at practice tomorrow evening.” Otosan says, ruffling Saku’s hair too, before leaving the room.

After you watch him leave, you and Saku stand there in silence, before Saku finally speaks, “Otosan is awesome, isn’t he?”

“Awesome? He treated us like babies and nearly suffocated me with his flab! Then he kissed me out of nowhere…”

Saku shrugs, “I don’t know, I thought he was really nice! He was just so… warm, wasn’t he?” Saku grins and hugs himself. “I guess he… kinda was.” You blush, but don’t know why. Thinking about it, Otosan’s belly was pretty warm, and a sorta comfortable, like a pillow… You snap yourself out of those thoughts and sigh. “I guess this’ll just take some getting used to.” Saku just smiles, “I think you’ll adjust fast! This is kinda weird… but I think it’s okay!”

“Well, hopefully there’s no more surprise teacher visits today…” You say. The weirdness of today was pretty exhausting. “What were you wanting to do, Saku?” You ask him. He shrugs, “I was thinking about looking around the school some more, but you can stay here if you want.”You groan and decide to…

11523.content:
"I phink 'm stiw hungwy," 'Chubby' replied, an adorable blush on her cheeks. Less than an hour after arriving in this room and already, she had acquired a very cherubic physique, her stomach having swollen into a large, soft, doughy mound that rested lazily on her lap. Her hips had ballooned outwards, filling her new uniform, and her legs were like big, squashy zeppelins holding her body up. You smiled shyly at her; you could not help but admire her plumpness.

"Allow me," you proudly declared as you staggered onto your feet. You could not see the full extent of your own newfound weight, but from 'Chubby's' giggling, you could imagine that you had gained quite a lot of weight in quite a short length of time yourself. This was especially evident as you tried and failed to pull the hem of your tee over your belly.

But your friend was hungry and the tubes were not returning, so it was up to you!

With a profound, swaying, wobbling gait, you slowly waddled towards a giant, multi-coloured fridge that stood tall and proud in the corner of the nursery, all the while chuckling as the soles of your feet were tickled by the soft, loamy floor with each step. Opening it, your eyes widened at the dizzying number of treats that filled its deceptive space - bottles as large as you were, full near to bursting, jars of mashed foods of every flavour and spongy sweets of every kind stuffed into a single shelf.

"Dat one!" 'Chubby' exclaimed, pointing inside.

You followed her finger to an enormous bottle filled with rich, pink milk. Pulling out the vast vessel, you read the label and glanced at the cartoon fruit adorning it - strawberry. Swinging your hip, you closed the door and waddled back to your friend.

"Open wide an' say 'aah'!" you grinned as you brought the lip of the bottle to her waiting mouth.

'Chubby' obliged and grabbed the bottle, eagerly sucking the rich strawberry milk. You smiled adoringly down at her, her giggling muffled as she greedily drank and drank. You hugged the bottle, helping to feed her further and further. Soon, 'Chubby' was lying upon her back, letting the rich milk pour down her throat, her formless arms flapping in pleasure. You could see her stomach swell further and further, becoming tauter and tighter with each passing gulp. You saw her face, her cheeks swollen like those of a chipmunk's. Her eyes stared up at yours, and a smile stretched as far as it could across her face as she continued drinking. You stared back, focusing for so long on her lovable face...

... that you did not see the bottle in her right hand until its nipple entered your mouth.

"Mmm?" was the last noise you made before a torrent of milk entered your mouth, overwhelming your senses with a flavour that reminded you of white chocolate. You greedily accepted the rich offering, 'Chubby's' muffled giggling filling your ears as you and she drank deep. You could feel your own belly grow rounder and larger, pressing against the bottle you held in your bulging arms. You could feel your cheeks stretch out ever so slightly further by the second, bulging to accommodate the tide of milk as it entered your body.

For what felt like a blissful eternity, you continued swelling, your mutual feeding fattening each other further and further. It was only when your tummy felt sore that you finally stopped, releasing the bottle's nipple at last. You blinked and breathed deeply, letting your body digest the rich drink.

"Wow!" You turned to face your friend, who was grinning approvingly up at you. 'Chubby' had evidently had enough to drink a while ago. The strawberry milk bottle was lying next to her, still as inexplicably full as it was when you pulled it from the fridge.

"You can reawy jink when you wanna!" she said.

You opened your mouth to say something - to thank her for the drink, to thank her for being your new friend, to ask to play with her - when suddenly, a tiny belch emerged from your lips and you fell forward to lie next to her, the soft floor and your massive belly cushioning the landing that you did not feel a thing. You must have bounced on your paunch as you landed! 'Chubby' seemed to think so, as she crawled over to you, giggling.

"You're so big and wound!" she declared in awe, as she pressed her tiny, soft hands against your sides. As if to press the point further, she playfully rolled you onto your back, your great dome of a belly pointed up at the ceiling. Before you had a chance to get back up, she suddenly belly-flopped on top of you, landing on your belly, her face against your chest.

"Oof!" You felt the wind rush out of your mouth in a geyser. "Phank'you." You smiled and gently placed an arm around 'Chubby', hugging her as best as your bloated bodies allowed.

"Welcome, freshmen!" smiled a fat, yet pretty woman with long black hair and glasses. "My name is Mimoshi-sensei, and I am your class supervisor,"

You look around, seeing a bunch of boys and girls your age, dressed casually. Obviously uniforms haven't been handed out for this class yet. It was quite a trip to get here to this part of Japan, but this school looks pretty good.

"Now then, you will attend to several rules," said Mimoshi, as she waddled back and forth.
"1: You will wear your school uniform everyday. We will not tolerate anything else. 2: Curfew is at 9:00 PM sharp!"

You hear a bunch of groans from all the students.

"3: You will obey your instructors. You will do what they say and eat what they say," said Mimoshi.

Ok, that last part was kind of weird.

"4: If you require assistance, talk to one of your teachers for help,"

Well, that's obvious.

"5: You will not head for the upperclassmen part of the school until later in the year when you will be able to fit with them better," finished Mimoshi. "Now then, you will be handled your dorm settings. You'll find your uniforms there,"

You blink and turn to see a cute red-haired boy with a French styled outfit and looking a little short than you.

"What is zis?!!!" shouted Jacque, before you run out and take a peek. His is the same, except blue instead of pink. The rooms are fashioned like they're for babies...no rather, babies who would be your size, except a lot bigger! What's going on?!!!

You then see a box on the crib in your "room" and open it to find an extra stretchy diaper and a pink baby tee. Just what kind of school is Milkroot anyway?!!!
